verses.verse: Now there was a <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin,<s%> whose <S%H8034>name<s%> was <S%H7027>Kish,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H22>Abiel,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6872>Zeror,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1064>Bechorath,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H647>Aphiah,<s%> a <S%H1145>Benjamite,<s%> a <S%H1368>mighty<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H2428>power.<s%>

And he <S%H1961>had<s%> a <S%H1121>son,<s%> whose <S%H8034>name<s%> was <S%H7586>Saul,<s%> a <S%H970>choice<s%> <S%H970>young<s%> man, and a <S%H2896>goodly:<s%> and there was not among the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> a <S%H2896>goodlier<s%> <S%H376>person<s%> than he: from his <S%H7926>shoulders<s%> and <S%H4605>upward<s%> he was <S%H1364>higher<s%> than <S%H3605>any<s%> of the <S%H5971>people.<s%>

And the <S%H860>asses<s%> of <S%H7027>Kish<s%> <S%H7586>Saul's<s%> <S%H1>father<s%> were <S%H6>lost.<s%> And <S%H7027>Kish<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H7586>Saul<s%> his <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H3947>Take<s%> <S%H4994>now<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> of the <S%H5650>servants<s%> with you, and <S%H6965>arise,<s%> <S%H3212>go<s%> <S%H1245>seek<s%> the <S%H860>asses.<s%>

And he <S%H5674>passed<s%> through <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H669>Ephraim,<s%> and <S%H5674>passed<s%> through the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H8031>Shalisha,<s%> but they <S%H4672>found<s%> them not: then they <S%H5674>passed<s%> through the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H8171>Shalim,<s%> and there they were not: and he <S%H5674>passed<s%> through the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H1145>Benjamites,<s%> but they <S%H4672>found<s%> them not.

And when they were <S%H935>come<s%> to the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H6689>Zuph,<s%> <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to his <S%H5288>servant<s%> that was with him, <S%H3212>Come,<s%> and let us <S%H7725>return;<s%> <S%H6435>lest<s%> my <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H2308>leave<s%> caring for the <S%H860>asses,<s%> and take <S%H1672>thought<s%> for us.

And he <S%H559>said<s%> to him, <S%H2009>Behold<s%> <S%H4994>now,<s%> there is in <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H5892>city<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> and he is an <S%H3513>honorable<s%> <S%H376>man;<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> that he <S%H1696>said<s%> <S%H935>comes<s%> surely to pass: <S%H6258>now<s%> let us <S%H3212>go<s%> <S%H8033>thither;<s%> <S%H194>peradventure<s%> he can <S%H5046>show<s%> us our <S%H1870>way<s%> that we should <S%H1980>go.<s%>

Then <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H7586>Saul<s%> to his <S%H5288>servant,<s%> But, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> if we <S%H3212>go,<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> shall we <S%H935>bring<s%> the <S%H376>man?<s%> for the <S%H3899>bread<s%> is <S%H235>spent<s%> in our <S%H3627>vessels,<s%> and there is not a <S%H8670>present<s%> to <S%H935>bring<s%> to the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God:<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> have we?

And the <S%H5288>servant<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H3254>again,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> I <S%H4672>have<s%> here at <S%H3027>hand<s%> the <S%H7253>fourth<s%> part of a <S%H8255>shekel<s%> of <S%H3701>silver:<s%> that will I <S%H5414>give<s%> to the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> to <S%H5046>tell<s%> us our <S%H1870>way.<s%>

<S%H6440>(Beforetime<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> when a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H3212>went<s%> to <S%H1875>inquire<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> he <S%H559>spoke,<s%> <S%H3212>Come,<s%> and let us <S%H3212>go<s%> to the <S%H7200>seer:<s%> for he that is <S%H3117>now<s%> called a <S%H5030>Prophet<s%> was <S%H6440>beforetime<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> a <S%H7200>Seer.<s%>)

Then <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H7586>Saul<s%> to his <S%H5288>servant,<s%> <S%H2896>Well<s%> <S%H1697>said;<s%> <S%H3212>come,<s%> let us <S%H3212>go.<s%> So they <S%H3212>went<s%> to the <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> was.

And as they <S%H5927>went<s%> up the <S%H4608>hill<s%> to the <S%H5892>city,<s%> they <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H5291>young<s%> <S%H5291>maidens<s%> <S%H3318>going<s%> out to <S%H7579>draw<s%> <S%H4325>water,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to them, Is the <S%H7200>seer<s%> <S%H2088>here?<s%>

And they <S%H6030>answered<s%> them, and <S%H559>said,<s%> He is; <S%H2009>behold,<s%> he is <S%H6440>before<s%> you: make <S%H4116>haste<s%> <S%H6258>now,<s%> for he <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H3117>day<s%> to the <S%H5892>city;<s%> for there is a <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> to <S%H3117>day<s%> in the <S%H1116>high<s%> place:

As soon as you be <S%H935>come<s%> into the <S%H5892>city,<s%> you shall <S%H3651>straightway<s%> <S%H4672>find<s%> him, <S%H2962>before<s%> he <S%H5927>go<s%> up to the <S%H1116>high<s%> place to <S%H398>eat:<s%> for the <S%H5971>people<s%> will not <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> he <S%H935>come,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> he does <S%H1288>bless<s%> the <S%H2077>sacrifice;<s%> and <S%H310>afterwards<s%> <S%H3651><s%> they <S%H398>eat<s%> that be <S%H7121>bidden.<s%> <S%H6258>Now<s%> therefore <S%H5927>get<s%> you up; for about this <S%H3117>time<s%> you shall <S%H4672>find<s%> him.

And they <S%H5927>went<s%> up <S%H8432>into<s%> the <S%H5892>city:<s%> and when they were <S%H935>come<s%> into the <S%H5892>city,<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H3318>came<s%> out <S%H7125>against<s%> them, for to <S%H5927>go<s%> up to the <S%H1116>high<s%> place.
Now the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> had <S%H1540>told<s%> <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> in his <S%H241>ear<s%> a <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H935>came,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

To <S%H4279>morrow<s%> about this <S%H6256>time<s%> I will <S%H7971>send<s%> you a <S%H376>man<s%> out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin,<s%> and you shall <S%H4886>anoint<s%> him to be <S%H5057>captain<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> my <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> that he may <S%H3467>save<s%> my <S%H5971>people<s%> out of the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines:<s%> for I have <S%H7200>looked<s%> on my <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> their <S%H6818>cry<s%> is <S%H935>come<s%> to me.

And when <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H7586>Saul,<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6030>said<s%> to him, <S%H2009>Behold<s%> the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> I <S%H559>spoke<s%> to you of! <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H2088>same<s%> shall <S%H6113>reign<s%> over my <S%H5971>people.<s%>

Then <S%H7586>Saul<s%> drew <S%H5066>near<s%> to <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> in the <S%H8179>gate,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H5046>Tell<s%> me, I <S%H4994>pray<s%> you, <S%H335>where<s%> <S%H2088><s%> the <S%H7200>seer's<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%> is.

And <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> <S%H7586>Saul,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> I am the <S%H7200>seer:<s%> <S%H5927>go<s%> up <S%H6440>before<s%> me to the <S%H1116>high<s%> place; for you shall <S%H398>eat<s%> with me to <S%H3117>day,<s%> and to <S%H1242>morrow<s%> I will let you <S%H7971>go,<s%> and will <S%H5046>tell<s%> you <S%H3605>all<s%> that is in your <S%H3824>heart.<s%>

And as for your <S%H860>asses<s%> that were <S%H6>lost<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> <S%H3117>ago,<s%> <S%H7760>set<s%> not your <S%H3820>mind<s%> on them; for they are <S%H4672>found.<s%> And on <S%H4310>whom<s%> is <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H2532>desire<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel?<s%> Is it not on you, and on <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H1004>house?<s%>

And <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> Am not I a <S%H1145>Benjamite,<s%> of the <S%H6996>smallest<s%> of the <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel?<s%> and my <S%H4940>family<s%> the <S%H6810>least<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H7626>tribe<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin?<s%> <S%H4100>why<s%> then <S%H1696>speak<s%> you <S%H1697>so<s%> to me?

And <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H7586>Saul<s%> and his <S%H5288>servant,<s%> and <S%H935>brought<s%> them into the <S%H3957>parlor,<s%> and <S%H5414>made<s%> them <S%H5414>sit<s%> in the most <S%H7218>chief<s%> <S%H4725>place<s%> among them that were <S%H7121>bidden,<s%> which were about <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H376>persons.<s%>

And <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H2876>cook,<s%> <S%H5414>Bring<s%> the <S%H4490>portion<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H5414>gave<s%> you, of <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H559>said<s%> to you, <S%H7760>Set<s%> it by you.

And the <S%H2876>cook<s%> <S%H7311>took<s%> up the <S%H7785>shoulder,<s%> and that which was on it, and <S%H7760>set<s%> it <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H7586>Saul.<s%> And Samuel <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H2009>Behold<s%> that which is <S%H7604>left!<s%> <S%H7760>set<s%> it <S%H6440>before<s%> you, and <S%H398>eat:<s%> for to this <S%H4150>time<s%> has it been <S%H8104>kept<s%> for you since I <S%H559>said,<s%> I have <S%H7121>invited<s%> the <S%H5971>people.<s%> So <S%H7586>Saul<s%> did <S%H398>eat<s%> with <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> that <S%H3117>day.<s%>

And when they were <S%H3381>come<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> from the <S%H1116>high<s%> place into the <S%H5892>city,<s%> Samuel <S%H1696>communed<s%> with <S%H7586>Saul<s%> on the <S%H1406>top<s%> of the house.

And they <S%H7925>arose<s%> <S%H7925>early:<s%> and it <S%H1961>came<s%> to pass about the <S%H5927>spring<s%> of the <S%H7837>day,<s%> that <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H7586>Saul<s%> to the <S%H1406>top<s%> of the house, <S%H559>saying,<s%> Up, that I may <S%H7971>send<s%> you away. And <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H6965>arose,<s%> and they <S%H3318>went<s%> out <S%H8147>both<s%> of them, he and <S%H8050>Samuel,<s%> <S%H2351>abroad.<s%>

And as they were <S%H3381>going<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> to the <S%H7097>end<s%> of the <S%H5892>city,<s%> <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H7586>Saul,<s%> <S%H559>Bid<s%> the <S%H5288>servant<s%> <S%H5674>pass<s%> on <S%H6440>before<s%> us, (and he <S%H5674>passed<s%> on), but <S%H5975>stand<s%> you still a <S%H3117>while,<s%> that I may <S%H8085>show<s%> you the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H430>God.<s%>
